derivation: or לֻבִּי; (Daniel 11:43), partrial from a name probably derived from an unused root meaning to thirst, i.e. a dry region; apparently
outline:
Libyans = "empty-hearted (Dan. 11:43)"
  1. class='lex2'>= "afflicted (Jer. 46:9)"
  • a people of northern Africa west of Egypt
strongs_def: a Libyan or inhabitant of interior Africa (only in plural)
